channel.title: Lobnya on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Lobnya on Rusland 1

item.title: Стрела – Burn Beautifully (Гореть красиво)
item.description: Burn The world is on fire (Мир в огне) and what can you do about it. Or with whom. Тут никого нет, there is no one here, Мы смотрим на мир, we are watching the world Каждый для каждого, each for themselves На то, как красиво горит, at how beautifully it burns.
